name: Death2All
description:
GameDev.TV Game Jam 2022 Entry - see https://itch.io/jam/gamedevtv-jam-2022

Premise

You've messed up.  As Death, you ventured onto a lost island which contains souls that were taken too early.  And they want revenge.

But where could they send you?  Hell? Ha - you're Death.  Hell is like a holiday for you.  No.  For you, there's only one place they can send you - and that's Heaven.

Do you're best to fight off the lost souls, and stay away from the Hell of Heaven for as long as you can!

Controls

W - Up
A - Left
S - Down
D - Right
Space - Jump
Left Mouse Button - Attack

You can move and change attack direction at the same time.

Be sure to play in Full Screen otherwise you won't see the whole level.

Conditions For Winning

Your penalty is inevitable. Keep those stairs to Heaven away for as long as you can. Try and beat your time!

Credits

https://freesound.org/people/infopablo/sounds/21887/ - Thunder sound.

https://freesound.org/people/LukeSharples/sounds/209080/ - Slicing Sound.

https://freesound.org/people/Wolfsinger/sounds/25760/ - Dum Dum Dummmmmm sound.

All other audio by me.

3D Assets

All from https://kenney.nl/ free assets (Graveyard Kit 3 and NatureKit 2.1 specifically), apart from Death (by me), the beam and the ground :/

Fonts

All free assets via:

https://www.dafont.com/james-fordyce.d170 - Bloody by James Fordyce

Rocky AOE by Astigmatic One Eye Typographic Institute - https://www.dafont.com/astigmatic-one-eye-typographic-institute.d62 

Notes:

This was very  rushed.  Family life and work inevitably takes up time, so squeezed in a bit here and there when I could.  Wasted a whole day fighting Blender into Unity - but alot learned.   

Thanks

Thanks to SirJLocks for ideas and general support - difficult to get things over the line without a bit of a push!
